ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Cluster Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) Data
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Cluster Unvalidated Summary Parameter FGM Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains 1 minute resolution unvalidated summary prime parameter measurements of the magnetic field vector from the fluxgate magnetometer (FGM) instrument on the Cluster 2 spacecraft. Unvalidated FGM data might sometimes contain artefacts such as spikes (duration ~ 1 spin), or short rotations (few spins). Very occasionally the data contain many spikes over several hours. Please contact Elizabeth Lucek (e.lucek@imperial.ac.uk) for more information regarding possible artefacts in specific intervals of data. The unvalidated summary prime parameter data set does not contain the spacecraft position data or additional range and telemetry mode information that the CAA parameter data set does contain.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA, Andre Balogh, Elizabeth E. Lucek

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Cluster II Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) Data

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000

Parameter.Name: Half Sample Time Interval
Parameter.Description: Half the mean separation between time tags, averaged over the file

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time in data cell: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000.

Parameter.Name: Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer status

Parameter.Name: DC Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer dc magnetic field vector

Parameter.Name: Normalized Magnetic Field Variance Summed
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized magnetic field variance summed, which is equivalent to the sum over the component variances

Parameter.Name: Normalized Variance of the Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Unvalidated Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized variance of the magnetic field magnitude
